comments:
I get the following Exception when trying to start M6. I guess one of the 
installed third party plugins is causing the error. Unfortunately I don't know 
how to find out *which* plugin is responsible (other then trial and error).

!SESSION ----------------------------------------------------------------------

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 47927 ***

I may be missing something, but I don't expect this bug to be fixed by the 
resolution for bug 47927. Further investigation showed that the problem isn't 
due to a removed plugin, but because of the *existence* of the Method Wizard 
plugin ( http://www.hawlitzek-
consulting.de/Java_Downloads/Eclipse_Extensions/Eclipse_Extensions_English/eclip
se_extensions_english.html ). *Removing* that plugin actually fixed the problem!

The problem was manifested by any changes to the set of installed plugins
between invocations of the platformm.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 47927 ***
